Middlesbrough were ultimately left empty-handed on a frustrating transfer deadline day, despite Chris Wilder's hope to sign three players before the window closed.
After defeat to Watford, the Boro … [+4313 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Hector Bellerin 'is close to re-joining boyhood club Barcelona on a free transfer - Daily Mail
articles.description: He has won three FA Cups and three Community Shields, scoring nine goals and assisting 29 more in 239 games for the Gunners, since joining from Barcelona's academy in 2011.
articles.content:
Hector Bellerin has completed a sensational return to Barcelona from Arsenal.  
The defender has won three FA Cups and three Community Shields, scoring nine goals and assisting 29 more in 239 games … [+2568 chars]
